name: Spreo26
body:
# Projects

## Compose-pad | [live](http://compose-pad.herokuapp.com/) | [code](https://github.com/SPreo26/compose-pad) | 2015 - 2016

- MIDI music note sequencer for musically inclined individuals to quickly and easily write, play and save their own tunes.
- Utilizes Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, AngularJS, D3.JS, Bootstrap, Bootstrap UI (Angular module).
- Incorporates MIDI.js library to play user songs.
- Multiple song files can be open in tabs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
